title: Strengthening Practical Competencies Through Ethnic Flipped Learning-Based Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners primarily use smartphones and require project implementation integrating cultural values with practical application

learning_goals: Learners analyze regional cultural data using mathematical models incorporating the Tree Mandala concept
Learners improve problem-solving strategies by over 80% through peer assessment in flipped learning environments
Learners complete over 90% of collaborative assignments on the mobile-based Schoology platform and produce practical reports

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
